Choose the correct sentence. a. The girl mother is at home. b. The girls mother is at home. c. The girls' mother is at home. d. The mother of the girl is at home.
Choose the correct sentence. a. His hair color is brown. b. His hairs color is brown. c. His hair's color is brown. d. His hairs' color is brown.
Choose the correct sentence. a. Is that the sister of Carlos? b. Is that Carlos's sister? c. Is that Carlo's sister? d. Is that Carloses' sister?
Choose the correct sentence. a. Where are the geese's eggs? b. Where are the geeses eggs? c. Where are the geese eggs? d. Where are the eggs of the geese?
Choose the correct sentence. a. When is the birthday of your husband? b. When is your husbands' birthday? c. When is your husband birthday? d. When is your husband's birthday?
You are late to class. Where are ____ books? a. my b. your c. his d. her

That man is my uncle. _____ name is Bruce. a. My b. You c. His d. Her

Whom
Who
